mapper.select: select transaction_id as transactionId, transaction_code as transactionCode, transaction_datetime as transactionDateTime, transaction_amount as transactionAmount, card_company as cardCompanyCode, card_number as cardNumber, store_name as storeName, store_address as storeAddress, industry_code as industryCode from my_data_transactions where transaction_id > #{transactionId} and card_number = #{cardNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into my_data_transactions(transaction_id, transaction_code, transaction_datetime, transaction_amount, card_company, card_number, store_name, store_address, industry_code) values(#{transactionId}, #{transactionCode}, #{transactionDateTime}, #{transactionAmount}, #{cardCompanyCode}, #{cardNumber}, #{storeName}, #{storeAddress},#{industryCode})
